name: npc_dota_hero_ringmaster
bio_loc:
Welcome, welcome, one and all — to a stage-lit extravaganza for the ages! Prepare to have your senses shattered! Your expectations demolished! Your Ancients smashed to ruins!

Witness the impossible feats and derring-do of the one and only clockwork marvel, the Great Cogliostro Kettle — Ringmaster, torture artist, genius in his own time — here now for the sole agony and entertainment of any hero bold enough to draw back the crimson carnival curtain and behold what mysteries await inside.

The mistake most maestros make is waiting for the public to come to them. The Ringmaster knows you need to go out and find your audience! Drag them to you. And make them watch.
hype_loc: All the battlefield's a stage, and Ringmaster is a gleeful director indeed. Controlling fights with a showman's flare, Ringmaster tames enemies with his fearsome whip and endless knives, ushers allies away from danger with his cunning escape act, and always draws a crowd to unwillingly witness the wonders of his mesmerizing wheel.
npe_desc_loc: Directs the battle with fear and mesmerism

facets.description_loc: Ringmaster is still new to the spotlight. This facet doesn't do anything... yet.
facets.name: ringmaster_default

abilities.name: ringmaster_tame_the_beasts
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Ringmaster twirls his whip for up to %abilitychanneltime% second then cracks it. Whipped enemies are damaged and flee in fear from Ringmaster. Channel time exponentially increases damage and extends the fear duration, but reduces the radius.
abilities.lore_loc: From unhappy crowds to unruly acts, nothing persuades a pack of animals quite like the crack of the Ringmaster's whip.

abilities.name: ringmaster_the_box
abilities.desc_loc: Ringmaster packs himself or an allied hero into a mobile, extradimensional box. Boxed units gain phased movement, slow resistance, bonus magic resistance, and bonus movement speed. They are also untargetable, muted, silenced, and disarmed. The box will pop open after the effect expires or it moves more than %leash_radius% units away.
abilities.lore_loc: An adept assistant has nothing to fear within the confines of The Box. An amateur has...much darker prospects indeed.

abilities.name: ringmaster_impalement
abilities.desc_loc: Ringmaster throws one of his daggers to a precise point of his choosing. If he strikes an enemy, the dagger deals impact damage, briefly slows the unit hit, and causes them to bleed. The bleeding deals a percentage of the victim's maximum health in damage every second to heroes and flat damage per second to creeps.
abilities.lore_loc: Passed down through generations, it simply wouldn't be a Kettle Circus without the Great Cogliostro's signature trick.

abilities.name: ringmaster_spotlight
abilities.desc_loc:
Ringmaster shines a spotlight that sweeps over an area. Enemies in the light have a chance to miss their attacks and are revealed if invisible.

Illusions hit by the beam fade away, losing a percentage of their maximum health each second.
abilities.lore_loc: Are you ready for your fifteen seconds? The limelight draws no distinction between infamy and fame.

abilities.name: ringmaster_wheel
abilities.desc_loc:
Ringmaster rolls the Wheel of Wonder to the targeted location, knocking aside enemies along the way. After it reaches its target, enemies in range of the wheel take damage over time and are slowed by %aura_slow%%%.

Enemy heroes who face the wheel for more than %face_duration% seconds are mesmerized and drawn towards it. The first enemy to be mesmerized triggers a timer for the wheel to explode. If the timer is not triggered, it will automatically explode after %trap_duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: No, brave friends, illusions are for charlatans and card sharks. What you witness today is the power of true magic. But only if you dare set your gaze upon...the mesmerizing wheel.

abilities.name: ringmaster_dark_carnival_souvenirs
abilities.desc_loc:
Ringmaster receives a random single-use Dark Carnival Souvenir whenever an enemy hero dies within %souvenir_collection_range% units of him. Additional Souvenirs are held as charges.

If Ringmaster does not have a Souvenir when he respawns he will be granted one.

Souvenirs of the Dark Carnival include a Funhouse Mirror, a Strongman Tonic, and a Whoopee Cushion.

abilities.name: ringmaster_funhouse_mirror
abilities.desc_loc:
Use: Proportion Distortion

Creates %images_count% imperfect image of your hero that lasts %illusion_duration% seconds. Your illusion deals %tooltip_damage_outgoing_ranged%%% and takes %tooltip_damage_incoming_total_pct%%% damage.
notes_loc: Has a %invuln_duration% second cast time during which you are invulnerable.

abilities.name: ringmaster_strongman_tonic
abilities.desc_loc:
Use: Forcefully Imbibe

Temporarily increases an allied hero's Strength by %strength_bonus_base% plus %strength_bonus_per_level% per Ringmaster's level for %duration% seconds. The effect holds for %effect_strength_max_duration% seconds and then deteriorates over the duration.

abilities.name: ringmaster_whoopee_cushion
abilities.desc_loc:
Use: Whoopsie

Propels your hero forward %leap_distance% units. Leaves a %fart_cloud_radius% radius stink cloud behind for %fart_cloud_duration% seconds that slows enemies by %fart_cloud_slow%%%.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_ringmaster_whip_debuff_immunity
talents.name_loc: Debuff Immunity While Channeling Tame the Beasts

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_ringmaster_dagger_bleed_and_slow_duration
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_bleed_duration}s Impalement Arts Bleed and Slow Duration

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_ringmaster_the_box_strong_dispel_and_flying
talents.name_loc: Escape Act Grants Strong Dispel and Flying
